content: edit as people have noted the beards are heavy the only way to attached i had seen when i wrote up the pattern was buttons others have since attached the beard to a hair elastic so that it just holds to the face like a head band or have used strings/yarn to tie the beard to the face these options might work better for you this pattern here was the original inspiration for my pattern 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/viking-or-dwarven-beard i had a couple issues with the pattern 1 the end base result was way to big for my face i ended up shirking it twice 2 i disliked the mustache braid as it was not realistic as the braid went up and over the lip and ended up having the braids point in two different directions 3 the middle braid was attached after the fact and just didn t seem epic enough 4 last i needed to make a wizard beard and this pattern had no alterations listed to accommodate that i still want to give the original pattern and pattern creator credit and please if you think you have a larger face or head see their pattern for the bigger base
